Reference

I. Get Drug Ingredient Via Indication

getRxcuiViaMaytreat()

Get RxCui based on may treat

getRxcuiViaMayprevent()

Get RxCui based on may prevent

getMayprevent()

Get may prevent based on RxCui

getSbdRxcuiViaRxcui()

Get Semantic Branded Drug RxCui based on ingredient RxCui

II. Drug Code Integration

getNdcViaSbdRxcui()

Get NDC code based on RxCui

getRxcuiViaNdc()

Get RxCui based on NDC

getAtcViaRxcui()

Get NDC code based on RxCui WHO Collaborating Centre for Drug Statistics Methodology, ATC classification index with DDDs, 2019. Oslo, Norway 2018

getRxcuiViaAtc()

Get RxCui based on ATC

getNHINoViaRCFNo()

Get NHINO based on RCFNO

getNHINoViaHC()

Get NHINO based on RCFNO

getAtcViaNHINo()

Get ATC Code based on NHINO

III. Calculate Drug Data

getDrugEra()

Generate Drug Era

getDDDs()

Get ATC DDDs value

calDailyDosage()

Calculate dailydosage for midication coding in RxNorm

calDDDsAccumulation()

Calculate subjects' acculated ddd before last dispensing

calDDDsRange()

Calculate subjects' accumulated DDDs in a custom interval period

IV. Visulization

getAtcLevelPlot()

Get ATC level histogram plot

getDrugEraPlot()

Get drug histogram plot

getDispensingPlot()

Get dispensing plot

Get Info

getRxcuiInfo()

Get RxCui infomation

getBoSSViaRxcui()

Get Ingredient and Basis of strength substance (BoSS)

getMEDRTInfo()

Get the Veterans Health Administration's Medication Reference Terminology (MED-RT) information based on RxCui
